|| *Component ID* || *Component Name* || *Type* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_FD_LGN VBA.FD.LGN] || Lateral Geniculate Nucleus || Sensory Relay Nucleus || Temporal decorrelation || Only 10% of inputs to LGN come from the retina. 90%<BR>are modulatory inputs from cortex and the brainstem ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_FD_PV_IPV VBA.FD.PV.IPV] || Inferior Pulvinar || Sensory Relay Nucleus || Dorsal =Where= Stream || Thalamus ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_FD_PV_LPV VBA.FD.PV.LPV] || Lateral Pulvinar || Sensory Relay Nucleus || Ventral =What= Stream || Thalamus ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_FD_PV_MPV VBA.FD.PV.MPV] || Medial Pulvinar || Sensory Relay Nucleus || Integration of associative cortical information and projects to<BR>visuomotor-related cortex || CG, PMC, PFC connections ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_FD_RT VBA.FD.RT] || Retina || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Spatial decorrelation through center surround inhibition || 100:1 cones/rods to ganglion cells aggregation,<BR>edge extraction ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_HM_NPH VBA.HM.NPH] || Prepositus Nucleus || Sensory Control Nucleus || Integrate PPRF phasic signal to provide tonic signal of abducens || Part of horizontal gaze holding system ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_HP_ABD VBA.HP.ABD] || Abducens Nucleus || Motor Relay Nucleus || Conjugated movements of both eyes || Motoneurons - to muscle, interneurons - to OCN ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_MM_EWN VBA.MM.EWN] || Edinger-Westphal Nucleus || Preganglionic Nucleus || Change Eye Pupil || Muscle nucleus, parvocellular extention of OCN ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_MM_OCN VBA.MM.OCN] || Oculomotor Nucleus || Motor Relay Nucleus || Change Eye Direction || Muscle nucleus ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_MM_PT_NOT VBA.MM.PT.NOT] || Nucleus of Optic Tract || Sensory Relay Nucleus || Encode retinal error information during smooth pursuit eye movements || Guide motor learning during horizontal SP ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_MM_PT_PON VBA.MM.PT.PON] || Pretectal Olivary Nucleus || Sensory Control Nucleus || Pupillary light reflex and modulating subcortical nuclei involved in circadian<BR>rhythms || Primary visual centre, involved in the pupillary<BR>light reflex, receives retinal input ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_MM_PT_PR VBA.MM.PT.PR] || Principal Pretectal Nucleus || Sensory Control Nucleus || Pupillary light reflex || Affected by visual cortex and projects to EWN ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_MM_PT_SL VBA.MM.PT.SL] || Sublentiform Nucleus || Sensory Control Nucleus || Accomodation reflex || Combines visual cortex and retinal input to project<BR>to OCN, receives retinal input ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_MM_RP_RIP VBA.MM.RP.RIP] || Raphe Interpositus Nucleus || Excitatory Nucleus || Premotor network for saccades || Gate activity of burst neurons for vertical and<BR>horizontal saccades ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_MM_SC_SUP VBA.MM.SC.SUP] || Superficial Superior Colliculus || Sensory Control Nucleus || Head and eye attention to visual stimuli || Receive input primarily from the visual system and<BR>show primarily visual responses ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_MM_SOA VBA.MM.SOA] || Supraoculomotor Area || Motor Control || Control of vergence || Dorsal to OCN, send premotor commands to OCN ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_MM_TRH VBA.MM.TRH] || Trochlear Nucleus || Motor Relay Nucleus || Control superior oblique muscles of eyes || Muscle nucleus, change eye direction ||
|| [BrainRegionVBA_SC_IZ_CSC VBA.SC.IZ.CSC] || Ciliospinal Center || Preganglionic Symp. Nucleus || Control of iris dilator muscle || Budge's Center, intermediolateral cell column ||
